GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
ASoC: codecs: wcd934x: Add missing of_node_put() in wcd934x_codec_parse_data

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit f3793eeb7b94a5eeed6f5c7a44bce403c6681a12, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit a61f3b4f476eceb25274161e5a53a8d18e42610b. For more details please see the references link.
